scripts.start-pm2: export NODE_ENV='production' && pm2 start build/index.js --no-pmx --node-args="--expose-gc --optimize_for_size" --name stats --kill-timeout 60000 --log-date-format 'MM-DD HH:mm:ss'
scripts.start-pm2j: export NODE_ENV='production' && export LD_PRELOAD=$LD_PRELOAD:/usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libjemalloc.so && pm2 start build/index.js --no-pmx --node-args="--expose-gc --optimize_for_size" --name stats --kill-timeout 60000 --log-date-format 'MM-DD HH:mm:ss'
scripts.start-node: export NODE_ENV='production' && pm2 start build/index.js --no-pmx --node-args="--expose-gc --no-compilation-cache --optimize_for_size" --name stats --kill-timeout 60000 --log-date-format 'MM-DD HH:mm:ss'
scripts.start-node-i: export NODE_ENV='production' && pm2 start build/index.js --node-args="--expose-gc --inspect --no-compilation-cache --optimize_for_size" --name stats --kill-timeout 60000 --log-date-format 'MM-DD HH:mm:ss'
